column2: [From.GetBestName] feels the realm would he better off under [From.GetHerHis] rule.
[From.GetBestName] feels the realm would he better off under [From.GetHerHis] rule.
Put the plot into motion by sending an ultimatum to [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName].
This character is skilful at leading men into battle.
I have been recognised as a skilful commander.
My men think I should be granted a triumph by my liege in recognition of my military skills. I could send a messenger, but such a request might not go down well.
[From.GetBestName] would like me to grant [GetHerHim] a triumph in recognition of [GetHerHis] military skills.
I name you pretender! Surrender now or face war! Rest assured, I have gathered the men and materials needed for victory.
I guess I have no choice...
You have been forced to abdicate to [From.GetBestName].
